original_title: International Air Cargo Terminal to handle SriLankan aircraft at Japan’s Narita
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – A contract for providing airport ground handling services for SriLankan Airlines aircraft at Narita Airport, in Tokyo, Japan, was awarded to International Air Cargo Terminal Co Ltd, cabinet spokesman Dr Bandula Gunawardena said Tuesday (9).
International Air Cargo Terminal Co will provide ground operation services for SriLankan aircraft from August 1, 2024 to July 31, 2027.

The company was chosen through an international bidding process, Gunawardena said, and the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee recommended the bidder, as it was the lowest bidder that had responded substantially. (Colombo/Jan9/2024)
